entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: They were hacking and stabbing at the ankles and shins of Death Eaters...

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry looked around as Death Eaters were folding under sheer weight of numbers... Harry sped between duelers, past struggling prisoners, and into the Great Hall.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort was in the center of the battle, and he was striking and smiting all within reach.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Harry saw Yaxley slammed to the floor by George and Lee Jordan...
